Universal Merchant Bank, nke a na-akpọbu Merchant Bank Ghana Limited, bụ ụlọ akụ Ghana nke mepere isi na Accra.
Universal Merchant Bank meghere ọha na eze na 15 Maachị 1972 dịka ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa
Ụlọ akụ ahụ mechara webata ụlọ akụ na-ere ahịa site n'inweta ikikere ụlọ akụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na 2005.
Universal Merchant Bank nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Accra, isi obodo Ghana
Alaka ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka ya gụnyere ebe ndị a:
